wikipedia_page.main: Captain Sir Montagu Frederick Ommanney,  (4 April 1842 – 19 August 1925) was a British civil servant and Head of the Colonial Office 1900–1907.

response: * Montagu Frederick Ommanney, Esq., CMG, one of the Crown Agents for the Colonies.
* Sir Montagu Frederick Ommanney, KCB, KCMG, ISO, Permanent Under Secretary of State for the Colonies and Secretary to the Most Distinguished Order
* Frederick Shelford (1871–1943) who married Mildred Alice née Ommanney (1877–1965) daughter of Sir Montagu Frederick Ommanney
